metadata.dc:author: Spinetto, Marcela
Benvenuto, Cecilia
Larregina, Luciana
metadata.dc:description: In examining predictors of Posttraumatic Stress Disorders, researchers have focused on trauma intensity, symptoms severity, personality disorders and devoted less attention to other variables. This descriptive study examine how personality disorders, intensity of trauma and demographic variables (previous trauma and vulnerability) are related to the likelihood of experiencing a trauma, and to the severity of posttraumatic symptoms in a sample of 50 patients reporting a wide range of trauma.
metadata.dc:title: Relación entre el Estrés Postraumático, los Trastornos de la Personalidad y los Antecedentes Personales en una Unidad de Estrés Postraumático (estudio descriptivo).
[Relationship between posttraumatic stress disorder, personality disorders, and personal history in a postraumatic unit (descriptive study)].
